title: Sultana and mango chutney
ingredients: ['1 1/4 pints distilled cider vinegar', '1.25kg (2 3/4 lb) caster sugar', '900g (2 lb) dark brown soft sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 dessertspoon ground ginger', '2 dessertspoons ground allspice', '1 teaspoon ground cloves', '1 dessertspoon ground nutmeg', '5 small red chillies, seeded and chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 large onions, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '350g (12 oz) sultanas', '50g (2 oz) root ginger, chopped', '2.6kg (5 3/4 lb) sliced, semi-ripe mangos', '50g (2 oz) flaked almonds (optional)']
